statements: DELETE FROM customer_behavior WHERE email = 'customer1@example.com' AND address LIKE '%Street%'
DELETE FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 500 AND customer_age > 30;
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 123 AND product_id = 456;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE customer_id = 101 AND age <= 30
DELETE FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000
